Plot: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and, later his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.
Title: The Prince of Egypt
Writer: Philip LaZebnik, Nicholas Meyer (additional screenplay material)
Actors: Val Kilmer, Ralph Fiennes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Sandra Bullock
tomatoConsensus: The Prince of Egypt's stunning visuals and first-rate voice cast more than compensate for the fact that it's better crafted than it is emotionally involving.
Director: Brenda Chapman, Steve Hickner, Simon Wells
